Detailed Description

Special class that handles rendering.

This class simply provides an interface through which RenderableListeners can be attached and be notified when they need to be rendered.

Remarks:
This class fills the role of "subject" or "originator" in the Observer pattern.
See also:
RenderableListener

void RenderOriginator::registerRenderableListener ( RenderableListener *  listener  )  [virtual]

Register a new RenderableListener to receive render notifications.

Parameters:
listener The RenderableListener to add.
Remarks:
If listener is already registered, this method will not do anything.

Definition at line 12 of file RenderOriginator.cpp.

void RenderOriginator::removeAllRenderListeners (  )  [inline]

This method removes all registered RenderableListeners.

Remarks:
This method should be called in the destructor of any subclasses of RenderOriginator to ensure that all the RenderListeners have been notified of the RenderOriginators destruction.

Definition at line 48 of file RenderOriginator.h.

Reimplemented in SceneManager.

Definition at line 69 of file RenderOriginator.h.

void RenderOriginator::removeRenderableListener ( RenderableListener *  listener  )  [virtual]

Remove a RenderableListener, it will no longer be notified when the RenderOriginator renders.

Parameters:
listener The listener to be removed.
Remarks:
If listener is not registered nothing will happen.

Definition at line 25 of file RenderOriginator.cpp.

virtual void RenderOriginator::render (  )  [pure virtual]

Abstract render method.

In most cases simply iterating over the registered RenderableListeners and calling their render methods is enough.

Implemented in RenderTexture, and SceneManager.
